description:
Product Classification for Production Statistics (GP),
GP2002 (main industrial groupings)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
51000 Foreign trade

Definition:
As of 1 January 2002, the previous major groups of the
Product Classification for Production Statistics have been
replaced by main industrial groupings (MIGs).
The commodity codes have been classified under the MIGs
based on their assignment to the six-digit headings of the
Product Classification for Production Statistics.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: GP2002 (main industrial groupings)
